WFMSU - About

It's by learning new things in life that makes us grow
- Samuel Zulu

Grassroots Water Infrastructure

Water For Morgan State University (WFMSU) is a student-based movement advocating for the reformation of water fountain infrastructure at MSU. The lack of easy access to water on the MSU campus is unhealthy and needs to be changed. Support the movement by submitting the survey and signing the petition. And to spread the word and keep up to date with the campaign, follow us on Instagram @waterformsu.

All support is greatly appreciated!

P.S. This movement is currently a class project. I have grown to see that there is a lot of potential in this so I'm looking to shift the gear into a real actionable movement. Stay tuned!

Join the Team

Currently, it is a one-person team behind all of this. My name is Ethan Joyner (Sophomore), and I fully understand that this project will not be something that I can single-handedly accomplish. So, if you have any skills that you think you can bring to the table, all are welcome from individuals, clubs, fraternities, and sororities. Send an email with "WFMSU-SUPPORT" in the title or fill out the survey with the button below.

Thank you.
